trends: There have been 5 other sightings in San Ramon
There were no other sightings in San Ramon on or around November 30th 1996
divs: Sighting Detailsive had a dozen sightings of these "lights", star like. the two most interesting happened in '97 and '01. the first occurred while i was sitting on my front porch having a cigarette. as i was stargazing at a patch of sky to the north, the 5-7 stars i was looking at began to slowly form the shape of a circle, then began rotating clockwise, like a wheel or a childs pin wheel in the wind. after about 5 seconds they dispersed and the lights slowly faded away. i was aw struck the second also happened in northern california. i was about four hours away from point reys on foot hiking tword the ocean. once i got to the coast it was dark. while i was standing on the beach and looking out over the water. a light appeared at close range but never emerged from the fog. as i was standing there i was once again aw struck by the light. i entered a kind of half awake half dream state and a mental image of the crafts interior appeared in front of my eyes. i saw two human figures inside standing up observing me as i was looking back at them, the air inside was super clean, like something in a laboratory clean room. the image in my head was crisp,clear and in black and white. and the only way i can clearify this experience to you is something a kin to what happens to a person after they set down a book theyve been reading for several hours, thier I.Q. and eye sight are raised to crisper and clearer levels. after about 5 seconds of this the light slowly faded away as it always does. ive mostly kept this to myself until now, i dont know why im coming out with this. im afraid people will think im nuts. but after seeing other people do it on the history channel i figured what the hell, what harm can it do. thank you,
Summary: jaw dropping aerial acrobatics. no doubt e.t.
